deep_nilmtk.loader package¶

deep_nilmtk.loader module¶

deep_nilmtk.loader.bertdataset module¶

class deep_nilmtk.loader.bertdataset.BERTDataset(inputs, targets=None, params={}, main_cutoff=6000)[source]¶

This class is dataLoader correponding to the BERT4NILM model. The original code can be found here: https://github.com/Yueeeeeeee/BERT4NILM/ .. _bertdataset:

compute_status(data)[source]¶
padding_seqs(in_array)[source]¶

deep_nilmtk.loader.generaldataset module¶

deep_nilmtk.loader.generaldataset.collate_fns(params, sample=False)[source]¶

This function is responsible of generating the dynamic sequences for each batch

Args:

max_num_context ([int]): number of context points max_num_extra_target ([int]): number of target points sample ([bool]): if true sample from the static length sequence to obtain smaller sequences sort (bool, optional): [description]. Defaults to True. context_in_target (bool, optional): [description]. Defaults to True.

class deep_nilmtk.loader.generaldataset.generalDataLoader(inputs, targets=None, params={})[source]¶

This class implements the most two common NILM data generators: The seq-to-seq and seq-to-point. The data is generated correponding to the sequence type. For the seq-to-point models, the position of the point can also be specified according to the point_positon paramter.

get_sample(index)[source]¶
deep_nilmtk.loader.generaldataset.npsample_batch(x, y, size=None, sort=True)[source]¶

Sample from numpy arrays along 2nd dim.

deep_nilmtk.loader.ptpdataset module¶

deep_nilmtk.loader.ptpdataset.pad_data(data, units_to_pad, border=0)[source]¶
class deep_nilmtk.loader.ptpdataset.ptpLoader(inputs, targets=None, params={})[source]¶

This class is the dataLoader for the temporal pooling NILM model. The original code can be found here: https://github.com/UCA-Datalab/nilm-thresholding
